tool_description: QR Code Generator for Saudi ZATCA (Fatoora) Invoice
name: KSA Zatca E-Invoice
title: KSA Zatca E-Invoice

api_list.name: KSA Zatca (Fatoora) E-Invoice QR Code Stage 1
api_list.description:
KSA Zatca (Fatoora) E-Invoice QR Code Stage 1
الفاتورة الالكترونية المملكة العربية السعودية
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ksa-zatca-e-invoice1.p.rapidapi.com/get-qr-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ksa-zatca-e-invoice1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
